original_title: W.M. Mendis’ liquor manufacturing license to be suspended
original_body_lines: The liquor manufacturing license issued to W.M. Mendis & Co. Limited will be suspended from tomorrow (December 5) due to their failure to pay Rs. 5.7 billion in excise taxes and surcharges, the Excise Department said.
The department further stated that continued tax evasion may result in the suspension of the other licenses issued to the company, after December 31, 2024.
